RelatedSentence: We visit a farm in Brentwood , where Farmland LP is converting 1,540 acres of farmland from conventional to organic .
We visit a farm in Brentwood , where Farmland LP is converting 1,540 acres of farmland from conventional to organic .
Craig Wichner , co-founder and managing director of Farmland LP , on his firm 's farm in Brentwood , 50 miles from San Francisco .

Some people may not realize that the Bay Area hosts a thriving agricultural industry home to more 500,000 acres of farmland and $ 350 million worth of annual revenue from crops within a 50 - mile radius of San Francisco .

I visited a working farm in Brentwood , a city on the eastern of Contra Costa County , where Farmland LP owns about 5,800 acres of farmland .
